ygData.subject: Re: Oracle Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: was wandering around that island the other day and only the guardian was there.  He conned blue to me and I considered playing with him   Was told that he
ygData.messageBody:
was wandering around that island the other day and only the guardian was
there. He conned blue to me and I considered playing with him <G> Was
told that he gives you a serious faction hit. Anyone know what that is?

Zoddie
Killer Wizzie

shauku@... wrote:
>
> From: shauku@...
>
> Well, to help you out the robes are obtained by killing the Oracle. He's on an island straight ahead and to the right of the sisters island if you're facing the ocean on the dock.
>
> However, his 40th lvl paladin buddy might have something to say about you beating on his pal. Take a group to whomp on them. P.S. this is the same island with the goblins.
>
> Zalbar The Mad
> 35th Wizard
> Solusek Ro
> Guildmaster Blood Tide
>
>
